des: "This quick oatmeal is one of my favorites to eat during the week. It has everything you need for a healthy start to your day and is creamy and sweet without dairy or sugar. It's the banana! Switch out the dried fruit and seeds/nuts to our liking."
ins:
Mash banana in a 2-cup microwave-safe bowl. Stir in water, oats, cherries, pumpkin seeds, cinnamon, and salt.
Microwave oat mixture until chewy and soft, about 1 minute 30 seconds. Let stand for 1 to 2 minutes before serving.
